name: European Palm Oil Alliance
goal:
The European Palm Oil Alliance (EPOA) aims to rebalance the debate on palm oil and food and achieve 100% sustainable palm oil in Europe in 2020. Current members consist of palm oil producers and palm oil refiners.

As a business initiative, the European Palm Oil Alliance (EPOA) is committed to creating a fact-based and balanced view on the nutritional and sustainability aspects of palm oil. EPOA communicates the full palm oil story and facilitates the European debate on palm oil, including reports on progresss against commitments on 100% sustainable palm oil in Europe.

EPOA aligns its messages and activities with the European Food Industry and associations; empowers and supports National Initiatives on Sustainable Palm Oil; gets support from several European Governments; and aligns EU Palm Oil Industry lobby with Producers / Governments Malaysia and Indonesia.
interests: Agriculture, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, External Relations, General and Institutional Affairs, International co-operation and development, Public Health, Trade
euInitiatives: Developments concerning the EP report on Palm Oil and Deforestation of Rainforests
